cause.description:
I have a bunch of great friends that I have not seen in a very long time. They all need a vacation and they all need to come and see me!
Disclaimer: Since I can't actually collect donations, anything donated from this site will go the The Humane Society
1. Bringing together bosom buddies.
cause.mission: Raise enough to send all of my friends to Kansas City!
cause.name: Jennifer Brule's Send a Friend to KC Fund
